sentences.en: He needn't be so smug, I know something he didn't know.
sentences.cn: 他用不着那么沾沾自喜, 我懂得某些他不懂得的东西.

sentences.en: He tried hard not to smile in smug self-satisfaction.
sentences.cn: 他强忍住沾沾自喜的笑容。

sentences.en: He was tense, irritable, bitter and smug.
sentences.cn: 他神经紧张, 心情烦躁, 牢骚满腹,可又自命不凡.
他写的满篇都是自鸣得意、道貌岸然的废话。

sentences.en: I reckon she has good reason to feel smug.
sentences.cn: 我认为她洋洋得意必有其缘故.

sentences.en: She had a smug self - congratulatory smile on her face.
sentences.cn: 她在她脸上露出自鸣得意的微笑.

sentences.en: So the real victory was still with his smooth , smug brother - in - law .
sentences.cn: 所以,真正取得胜利的还是他那八面玲珑自命不凡的 内弟.

sentences.en: The Chinese tend to be smug about old age.
sentences.cn: 中国人向来以高龄为荣.

sentences.en: The mathematicians were almost smug about this accomplishment.
sentences.cn: 数学家们几乎都为这一成就自鸣得意.

sentences.en: The programme seemed false and sugary, and the characters smug.
sentences.cn: 这个节目看起来矫揉造作，而其中的人物还自我感觉良好。

sentences.en: These days, molecular biologists are anything but smug.
sentences.cn: 现在, 分子生物学家们是无论如何也不安于现状了.

sentences.en: These two smug clouds are combining, fueling each other.
sentences.cn: 这两个自满气团正在融合, 激发对方.

sentences.en: Thomas and his wife looked at each other in smug satisfaction.
sentences.cn: 托马斯和他妻子互相看着对方，面带着自鸣得意的满足。

sentences.en: Tigress felt very smug in a tenement yard like this.
sentences.cn: 就是在个这样的杂院里,虎妞觉得很得意.

sentences.en: Why didn't they go away? Smug ones.
sentences.cn: 他们为什么不走开? 自命不凡的家伙们.

sentences.en: You've got nothing to be smug about.
sentences.cn: 你有什么值得自鸣得意的.

words.tran_cn: 自鸣得意地；沾沾自喜地
书呆子；自命不凡的家伙

trans.tran_cn: 自鸣得意的，自以为是的，整洁的，体面的
trans.tran_en: showing too much satisfaction with your own cleverness or success – used to show disapproval

trans.tran_cn: 书呆子；自命不凡的家伙
